trans-unit.source: Describes the placement of where a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control appears on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Descrive la posizione in cui un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> viene visualizzato sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration class to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare i membri di questa classe di enumerazione per impostare il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property value, together with the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> properties, determines where and how a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> appears on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> insieme ai valori del valore della proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> proprietà, determina dove e come un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> visualizzata sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Comportamento del controllo Popup in relazione al posizionamento](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates four <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> controls that are relative to an image.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente crea quattro <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> controlli relativi a un'immagine.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> has a different value for the placement property.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> ha un valore diverso per la proprietà di posizionamento.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control relative to the upper-left corner of the screen and at an offset that is defined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" /> property values.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> relativa all'angolo superiore sinistro dello schermo e in corrispondenza di un offset definito dai valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />.

trans-unit.source: If the screen edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control then repositions itself to align with the edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearsi al bordo.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control relative to the upper-left corner of the screen and at an offset that is defined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" /> property values.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> relativa all'angolo superiore sinistro dello schermo e in corrispondenza di un offset definito dai valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />.

trans-unit.source: If the screen edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control extends in the opposite direction from the axis defined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />=.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo si estende nella direzione opposta all'asse definito da <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />=.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control where the control aligns its upper edge with the lower edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> in cui il controllo allinea il proprio bordo superiore al bordo inferiore di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> e il proprio bordo sinistro al bordo sinistro di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: If the lower screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control repositions itself so that its lower edge aligns with the upper edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo inferiore dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearne il bordo inferiore al bordo superiore di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: If the upper screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control then repositions itself so that its upper edge aligns with the upper screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearne il bordo superiore al bordo superiore dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control where it is centered over the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> in cui viene centrato su <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: If a screen edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control repositions itself to align with the screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se un bordo dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearsi al bordo dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: A position and repositioning behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control that is defined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> delegate specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Posizione e comportamento di riposizionamento per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> definito dal delegato <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> specificato dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control that aligns its right edge with the left edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> and aligns its upper edge with the upper edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> che allinea il proprio bordo destro al bordo sinistro di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> e il bordo superiore al bordo superiore di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: If the left screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the right edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo sinistro dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> viene riposizionato in modo da allinearne il bordo sinistro al bordo destro di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: If the right screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the right edge of the control aligns with the right screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo destro dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il bordo destro del controllo viene allineato al bordo destro dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: If the upper or lower screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control repositions itself to align with the obscuring screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore o inferiore dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearsi a tale bordo.

trans-unit.source: A postion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control that aligns its upper edge with the lower edge of the bounding box of the mouse and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the bounding box of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> che ne allinea il bordo superiore e il bordo sinistro, rispettivamente, al bordo inferiore e al bordo sinistro del riquadro del mouse.

trans-unit.source: If the lower screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, it repositions itself to align with the upper edge of the bounding box of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo inferiore dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearsi al bordo superiore del riquadro del mouse.

trans-unit.source: If the upper screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control repositions itself to align with the upper screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearsi a tale bordo.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control relative to the tip of the mouse cursor and at an offset that is defined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" /> property values.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> relativa alla punta del cursore del mouse e in corrispondenza di un offset definito dai valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />.

trans-unit.source: If a horizontal or vertical screen edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, it opens in the opposite direction from the obscuring edge.
trans-unit.target: Se un bordo orizzontale o verticale dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo si apre nella direzione opposta a tale bordo.

trans-unit.source: If the opposite screen edge also obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, it then aligns with the obscuring screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se anche il bordo opposto dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene allineato a tale bordo.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control relative to the upper-left corner of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> and at an offset that is defined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" /> property values.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> relativa all'angolo superiore sinistro della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> e in corrispondenza di un offset definito dai valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />.

trans-unit.source: If the screen edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control repositions itself to align with the screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearsi al bordo dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control relative to the upper-left corner of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> and at an offset that is defined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" /> property values.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> relativa all'angolo superiore sinistro della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> e in corrispondenza di un offset definito dai valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />.

trans-unit.source: If a screen edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> extends in the opposite direction from the direction from the axis defined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />.
trans-unit.target: Se un bordo dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> si estende nella direzione opposta dalla direzione dall'asse definito da <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" />.

trans-unit.source: If the opposite screen edge also obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control then aligns with this screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se anche il bordo opposto dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene allineato a tale bordo dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control that aligns its left edge with the right edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> and aligns its upper edge with the upper edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> che ne allinea il bordo sinistro al bordo destro di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> e il bordo superiore al bordo superiore di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: If the right screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the left edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo destro dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearne il bordo sinistro al bordo sinistro di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: If the left screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the left screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo sinistro dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearne il bordo sinistro al bordo sinistro dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: If the upper or lower screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control then repositions itself to align with the obscuring screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore o inferiore dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearsi a tale bordo.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control that aligns its lower edge with the upper edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> che ne allinea il bordo inferiore al bordo superiore di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> e il bordo sinistro al bordo sinistro di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: If the upper screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the control repositions itself so that its upper edge aligns with the lower edge of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearne il bordo superiore al bordo inferiore di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: If the lower screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, the lower edge of the control aligns with the lower screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo inferiore dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il bordo inferiore del controllo viene allineato al bordo inferiore dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: If the left or right screen-edge obscures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, it then repositions itself to align with the obscuring screen.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo sinistro o destro dello schermo nasconde <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allinearsi a tale bordo.
